description: Human AB Serum is a vital cell culture reagent for some human cell types providing growth factors, vitamins, nutrients as well as trace elements and transport factors, ensuring faster growth rates than mixed blood group serum. Human AB is proven to grow many human cell lines at a faster rate and with a smaller percentage of serum than mixed blood group serum.Human AB Serum, Male only. Sterile filtered to 0.2 micron.
name: Human Serum AB, male only  - Off clot - EU - Standard Grade
